skins.shipDescription: Hatsuharu-class destroyer number one 每 Hatsuharu.
skins.selfIntroduction: I-I'm Hatsuharu, first ship of t-the Hatsuharu-class... I-I served in the north, together with my s-sisters from Destroyer Division 21... I didn't achieve much, b-b-but I tried my best...
skins.acquisition: I-i-it's nice to meet you, I-I'm Hatsuha... U-um... P-please don't stare at me so much...!
skins.login: *Cries*... I can't possibly be a secretary...
skins.details: C-Commander, um... I-I'm glad you're c-checking in on me, but...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I miss my sisters so much...
skins.secretaryIdle2: C-Commander... p-please don't stare at me so much...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I-I'm quite timid, b-but I'll work really hard! ... I hope...
skins.secretaryTouch: I need to talk with you more oft... Eek?!

skins.shipDescription: Hatsuharu, retrofit complete... H-hopefully I'm a little bit stronger now...
skins.acquisition: Hatsuharu, retrofit complete... H-hopefully I'm a little bit stronger now...
skins.login: I've grown now and should be able to handle secretary work! I-I'll be just fine... I think...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Now that I've grown, I need to act as a role model for my sisters... Um, never mind, that's impossible...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I-I thought I'd gained some courage, but when you stare at me like that, I... I lose it all...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Entrust me with sorties, commissions, or work! I-I'll tackle them as best I can!
skins.secretaryTouch: A-after my retrofit, I should now be someone you and my friends can depend on...

skins.shipDescription: Everyone's playing together...? I-I think I'll pass... Y-you want me to join them? Ugh, well, if you say so, then I-I-I'll try to socialize with them...!
skins.acquisition: Everyone's playing together...? I-I think I'll pass... Y-you want me to join them? Ugh, well, if you say so, then I-I-I'll try to socialize with them...!
skins.login: U-Um! ... I-I've already gotten u-used to Commander's gaze, so I'm okay! But... b-being stared at... I-I really can't...
skins.details: This is... a rabbit made of snow... I-It's still not done! ... But... making various things out of snow... i-is fun...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Eyes, eyebrows, and a nose... Just a little bit more...
skins.secretaryIdle2: W-Wakaba? T-The snow at home port isn't c-covered in pine nuts...
skins.secretaryIdle3: S-Snowball fight?! It's im-impossible for me! ...Hau...
skins.secretaryTouch: If it's with the Commander, this time... this time for sure... with everyone...!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wah?! Th-This is... unhh... (It looks like Hatsuharu fainted again)
